Text.val: ... prepare path/filename for CSV output file

ExpSyntax.val: 'INVO_SCHEDULEDATE <= '&ASCIIChr(39)&DStr({0,11},'YYYY-MM-DD')&ASCIIChr(39)&' and INVO_DUEDATE < '&ASCIIChr(39)&DStr({0,11},'YYYY-MM-DD')&ASCIIChr(39)&' and (INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE > '&ASCIIChr(39)&DStr({0,11},'YYYY-MM-DD')&ASCIIChr(39)&' or INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE is null'&')'

Text.val: -- Also write a CSV row if there are no DUNH rows
